channel.title: How to find my client uid?
channel.description:
Hello, I am using a client on my source, and I need to find the UID, I have no idea what it is, but I need it to be able to only let people access my server through that client. Need to find my UID of client, where can I find it? Thanks! :D Owner owwch-
**IDK IF THIS IS RIGHT SECTION**

item.title: How to find my client uid?
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

I just want to be able to block bad clients that cheat and hack and null my server. I saw the guide on mopar, but when i did it, it makes smy client and every client on my comp not connect and says Nullexception on my server cmd. So idk =/ I just want my server to not get nulled and stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: How to find my client uid?

item.title: How to find my client uid?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Nexus_, post:5, topic:397311”][quote author=owwch u died link=topic=494463.msg3614983#msg3614983 date=1306890835]
I need the ID for bombs cheat client, I have no idea what it is. Can you guys help me get or do you know it?
[/quote]
It would be practically impossible. If your victim has a dlable client, extract it and search the UID in the GUI or client classes. Just search “UID =” and it should come up.[/quote]

And even then, people can just replace the uid with

public int getUid() {
    Random random = new Random();
    return random.nextInt();
}

Read full topic
item.source: How to find my client uid?

item.title: How to find my client uid?
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

owwch u died:

I need the ID for bombs cheat client, I have no idea what it is. Can you guys help me get or do you know it?

It would be practically impossible. If your victim has a dlable client, extract it and search the UID in the GUI or client classes. Just search “UID =” and it should come up.

Read full topic

item.title: How to find my client uid?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Marine5287:

It will be in signlink.java

Either this, or there will be a file in your cache called “uid.dat” which is 4 bytes.

Read full topic
